# OpenCV2 计算机视觉应用编程秘籍（初译）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/opencv2-jisuanji-shijue-yingyong-biancheng-miji-chuyi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/opencv2-jisuanji-shijue-yingyong-biancheng-miji-chuyi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install opencv2-jisuanji-shijue-yingyong-biancheng-miji-chuyi
opencv2-jisuanji-shijue-yingyong-biancheng-miji-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g opencv2-jisuanji-shijue-yingyong-biancheng-miji-chuyi
opencv2-jisuanji-shijue-yingyong-biancheng-miji-chuyi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
